content.raw: I've modified the repositories to create cosmic distribution so apt-get should not fail now. We will start producing cosmic debs in the following days at least to support the gazebo9 latest version so I leave this issue open and change the tittle. I will update here as soon as we have gazebo 9.5.0 in the repo.
